original_title: Boot Camp 1: A Long Way from Home
overview: The story of BOOT CAMP (presented in two parts; Part-1 "A Long Way From Home" and Part-2 "The Trenches") encompasses the passions and yearnings of young men separated far from home for the first time, to their final realization and acceptance of the need to depend on each other in any situation. Authentic sets and costuming accompanied by an original music score and featuring a cast of over a dozen of the biggest stars in the adult industry will make you believe again in serving your country!
title: Boot Camp 1: A Long Way from Home
